member.name: T:Rectangle
member.summary: Rectangle class derived from shape class.

member.name: P:Rectangle.Width
member.summary: get: retrieve width set: if value is negative, throw an ArgumentException with the message Width must be greater than or equal to 0. Otherwise, set width to the value.

member.name: P:Rectangle.Height
member.summary: get: retrieve height set: if value is negative, throw an ArgumentException with the message Height must be greater than or equal to 0. Otherwise, set Height to the value.

member.name: M:Rectangle.Area
member.summary: This will override the Area() method defined in the Shape base class.
member.returns: Returns the area of the rectangle

member.name: M:Rectangle.ToString
member.summary: This will provide a better representation for the Rectangle. [Rectangle] width / height.

member.name: P:Square.Size
member.summary: Getter and setter for size value
